```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```

# First we generate spurious data

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
source('miscFunctions.R')

data <- data.frame(x = rnorm(100), y = rnorm(100,0.3))
p = T

result.t <- t.test(data$x, data$y, paired = p)
result.d <- lsr::cohensD(data$x, data$y)
result.bf <- BayesFactor::ttestBF(data$x, data$y, paired = p)
```


# Here we test stuff  

Formatting test: 
```{r results='asis'}
md.t(result.t)
```

The whole test:  
```{r results='asis'}
md.ttest(data$x, data$y, paired = p)
```

...and as a proportion:
```{r results='asis'}
md.ttest(data$x, data$y, paired = p, isProportion = T)
```
